1.name: Cleopatra
1.description: The fabled queen of Egypt's affair with Roman general Marc Antony is ulimately disastrous for both of them.

2.name: From the Manger to the Cross; or, Jesus of Nazareth

3.name: As You Like It
3.description: After the overthrowing of Duke Senior by his tyrannical brother, Senior's daughter Rosalind disguises herself as a man and sets out to find her banished father while also counseling her clumsy suitor Orlando in the art of wooing.

4.name: Satana
4.description: A four chapter film including Satan vs the Creator, Satan vs the Saviour, The Green Demon/Satan during the Dark Ages and The Red Demon/Satan in modern times.

5.name: La dame aux camélias

6.name: Pilgrim's Progress
6.description: Consists of two parts: Part One: The Life of John Bunyon (2 reels); Part Two: The Pilgrim's Progress (3 reels).

7.name: Oliver Twist
7.description: An orphan in early 19th century England escapes the poorhouse only to fall among a gang of pickpockets in London.

9.name: Richard III
9.description: Richard of Gloucester uses manipulation and murder to gain the English throne.

10.name: Le mystère des roches de Kador

16.name: De svarta maskerna
16.description: "The Black Masks", a secret political society, involves the beautiful agent Lydia to apprehend an important official document. Lieutenant von Muehlen is a trusted member of another secret society. He is on the same mission.

19.name: Independenta Romaniei
19.description: The movie depicts the Romanian War of Independence (1877-1878).

27.name: Oliver Twist
27.description: An orphan named Oliver Twist meets a pickpocket on the streets of London. From there, he joins a household of boys who are trained to steal for their master.

29.name: Les trois mousquetaires
29.description: D'Artagnan and his musketeer comrades must thwart the plans of Cardinal Richelieu to usurp King Louis XIII's power.

36.description: There is no documentation that a film bearing this title was directed by D.W. Griffith, or was produced by Biograph at this time. It may have been suspended before completion or else released under another title.

37.name: Lucrezia Borgia
37.description: About the daughter of the Borgia, a noble medieval house. From her numerous and unhappy weddings, to the forced monacation, to the will of her family.
